summary: A serial killer uses a horror video rental to lure his next victim. What begins as a teen slasher transforms into a disturbing journey through the mind of Max Parry, a mild mannered wedding photographer with a taste for human flesh.
cast: Kevin Howarth|Mark Stevenson|Antonia Beamish|Christabel Muir|Jonathan Coote|Rita Davies|Joe Hurley|Jamie Langthorne|John Berlyne|Mandy Gordon|Jim Bywater|Lisa Renée|Christopher Adamson|Adrian Johnson|John MacCrossan|Megan Whelan|Philip Harvey|Alexandra Hill|Melanie Smith|Nicola Greene|Simon Sherlock|Julie Mayhew|Gary Richards|Linda Regan|Lynn Radnedge|Stephen Dibben|Lena Oldrich|Karl Warwick|Henry Douthwaite|Gemma Morsley|Laura McNaught|Norman Mann|Tamara Ustinov|Arthur Egmore|Edna Egmore|Derek Wright|Rosana Coutinho|Julian Richards|Craig McCall|Mike Tims|Alex Ratcliffe|Jason Flavien|Paul Conway|Miranda French|Elif Tarakci|Anna Scaife|Teri Levett|Duncan Holmes|Tara Lester|Lisa Rose|Ranjit Krishnamma|Pierre Maubouche|Philip Rosch|Sabine|Catherine St. John Smith|David Redgrave|Mark Lambourne|Harry Grint|Brook Griffith|Simon Anderson|Emma Powell|Eduardo Garay Martinez|Drummond Bowskill|Nick Meakins|Manfred Gluska|Tom Bird|Ilona Medvedeva|Imran Sanusi|Milica Djukic|Brian Bowles
title: The last horror movie
